short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes comments of low-rated users. Choose color in popup menu, comments by users of color < chosen_color will be removed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides comments of low-rated users on codeforces.com. Choose color in popup menu, comments by users of color < chosen_color will be hidden. If there is an answer by high-rated user to comment by low-rated it's not removed.
